cab.content: Of"ItMilitary Secret. 1319From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,Stk March 1920.(Received 9th.)3124. 8th March.Malleson wires 3rd and 4th March that arrival of Bolshevik reinforcements in Kushk area has caused alarm in Herat. News reached Herat on 21th February. On 25th February there was much military activity, detachments of ail units went under canvas, and transport was collected. Next day this force, which included two guns, marched off on Kushk road. Bolshevik concentration has also caused excite-ment in Merv and Pandjeh areas. Their strength round Kushk is estimated at 2,000.s:hi
